name: 梁斯寧
objective: This course aims to develop students' English language skills and communicative competence for effective communication. Centered around the fields of science, technology and engineering, the materials and activities in the course are designed to prepare students to understand and discuss the topics of the fields.
schedule:

Week 2: Unit 10
Week 3: Unit 11
Week 4: Email
Week 5: Holiday
Week 6: Email 
Week 7: Unit 1
Week 8: Quiz 
Week 9: Mid-term assessment + campus-wide English exam
Week 10: Unit 3
Week 11: Unit 2
Week 12: Common writing errors
Week 13: Unit 2/3 extension
Week 14: Unit 4 + Quiz
Week 15: Unit 4
Week 16: Final assessment(s)
Week 17: Holiday
Week 18: Final assessment(s)
scorePolicy:
Attendance and class participation: 20%
Campus-wide English exam: 20%
Quizzes / assignments: 10%
Mid-term assessment: 20%
Final assessment: 30%
materials: Kenny, S., Sabatino, E., & Bondar, J. (2022). Capstone: English for Information and New Technology. Taipei: Crane Publishing.
